ChurnBaseValue: Numerical value indicating the base likelihood of churn for a customer. This could represent a model's base prediction before considering the effect of other variables.
SeniorCitizen: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer is a senior citizen (1) or not (0).
tenure: Numerical variable representing the number of months the customer has been with the company.
MonthlyCharges: Numerical variable indicating how much the customer is charged on a monthly basis.
TotalCharges: Numerical variable representing the total amount charged to the customer over the tenure.
gender_Male: Binary numerical variable indicating the customer's gender as male (1) or not (0).
Partner_Yes: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer has a partner (1) or not (0).
Dependents_Yes: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer has dependents (1) or not (0).
PhoneService_Yes: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer subscribes to phone service (1) or not (0).
MultipleLines_No phone service: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer does not have phone service and therefore cannot have multiple lines (1) or not applicable (0).
MultipleLines_Yes: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer has multiple phone lines (1) or not (0).
InternetService_Fiber optic: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer uses a fiber optic internet service (1) or not (0).
InternetService_No: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer does not have internet service (1) or not (0).
OnlineSecurity_No internet service: Binary numerical variable indicating the customer has no internet service, thus no online security service (1) or not applicable (0).
OnlineSecurity_Yes: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer subscribes to an online security service (1) or not (0).
OnlineBackup_No internet service: Similar to the online security variable, this indicates no internet service (1) or not applicable (0) for online backup services.
OnlineBackup_Yes: Indicates whether the customer has online backup services (1) or not (0).
DeviceProtection_No internet service: Indicates no internet service (1) or not applicable (0) for device protection services.
DeviceProtection_Yes: Indicates whether the customer has device protection services (1) or not (0).
TechSupport_No internet service: Indicates no internet service (1) or not applicable (0) for tech support services.
TechSupport_Yes: Indicates whether the customer subscribes to tech support services (1) or not (0).
StreamingTV_No internet service: Indicates no internet service (1) or not applicable (0) for streaming TV services.
StreamingTV_Yes: Indicates whether the customer subscribes to streaming TV services (1) or not (0).
StreamingMovies_No internet service: Indicates no internet service (1) or not applicable (0) for streaming movies services.
StreamingMovies_Yes: Indicates whether the customer subscribes to streaming movies services (1) or not (0).
Contract_One year: Binary numerical variable indicating whether the customer is in a one-year contract (1) or not (0).
Contract_Two year: Indicates whether the customer is in a two-year contract (1) or not (0).
PaperlessBilling_Yes: Indicates whether the customer has opted for paperless billing (1) or not (0).
PaymentMethod_Credit card (automatic): Indicates whether the customer's payment method is an automatic credit card payment (1) or not (0).
PaymentMethod_Electronic check: Indicates whether the customer's payment method is an electronic check (1) or not (0).
PaymentMethod_Mailed check: Indicates whether the customer's payment method is a mailed check (1) or not (0).
